attributes.action: To offer help automatically to people diagnosed with Aspergus Syndrome, straight away,in terms of vital social skills, interaction, normal relationship behaviour and understanding body language that everyone else learns naturally unlike people with Aspergus Syndrome, in order to develop like everyone else on an equal level in society and to integrate and operate healthily in society with friends and sexual relationships. So many people diagnosed have been disgustingly abandoned as it doesn't go under mental health or learning disability - this is revolting and many people with this condition are suffering in silence!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am speaking from experience, as I have this condition called Aspergus Syndrome. I feel I and others should have had automatic expert help around proper intergration into society on a normal level, around understanding relationships, sexual ones, body language, social skills - counselling just isn't sufficient!It is not humanly right that people with this condition are just left,so more should be done about this invisible disability as it is not physical.
